book.synopsis: Possessed with the gift of magic, Gwenlliant of Celydonn travels with her husband to Mochdreff to rule over a nation with a long history of animosity toward her people. Original.
book.title_long: The Castle of the Silver Wheel
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
